column5: Our marketing programme distinguishes itself from other programmes by offering an intricate combination of marketing practice and academic marketing insights, based on the latest data analysis tools in economics and marketing as well as on marketing practice cases. The unique combination of models, structures and real-life practice cases covers the entire marketing area â€“ from strategic marketing, target market selection and positioning, b-to-b and b-to-c segmenting, operational marketing planning, branding, as well as measuring and quantifying marketing effectiveness.
